task.problem: There are 99 murderers in a room. Joe walks into the room and kills three of them. How many murderers are in the room now?
task.solution:
There are initially 99 murderers in the room.
Joe kills three of them, so there are now 96 murderers in the room with Joe.
However, Joe, by killing them, becomes a murderer, increasing the count of murderers by one to 97.
So there are 97 murderers in the room.
